Steps for uploading Metadata using Bulk upload¶

  1. prepare library (if necessary)
    1. Make sure you have Python3 installed. ()
    2. On terminal - pip3 install xlrd
    3. Download bulk upload script (submission.py) and Excel Template (TaRGET metadata template v2.0.xlsx) from https://github.com/xzhuo/TargetBulkUpload
    1. On your first login, you will need to register as a new user (“Create New Account”). After completing all fields, select “Create”, then “Login”.
    2. Click “Show API key” to get your token.
    1. Replace ‘tokenstring’ in Line 9 to your real token string.
    1. Fill in the excel template.

    e. Run the following command on terminal .. code-block:: python

    python3 submission.py -t V2 -x <path to excel file>
